name: Uber Technologies, Inc.
summary: Uber Technologies, Inc. is a leading American multinational company that operates a technology platform for ride-hailing, food delivery, freight, and courier services. Headquartered in San Francisco, Uber connects millions of riders, drivers, and merchants worldwide, and is recognized as the largest ridesharing company globally. The company has diversified into multiple mobility and logistics sectors and remains at the forefront of urban transportation innovation.
